note.p: Death: The Royal Mint, London (22 November 1902)
Education: Royal School of Mines, London
Career: Assistant to the Master of the Mint; Chemist of the Royal Mint (1869); Professor of Metallurgy, School of Mines (1880); Chemist and Assayer to the Mint (1882-1902)
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1905 vol 75 pp 192-198 signed by T E T
References: Sir John Craig, 'The Royal Society and the Royal Mint' in NR 1964 vol 19 pp 156-167
